text: Raquel Saavedra Salvador (born May 11, 1981 in Barcelona) is a swimmer from Spain. She has a vision impairment and is an S11/B1 type swimmer. She raced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. She finished first in the 100 meter backstroke. She finished third in the 4 x 100 meter 49 points medley relay race. She raced at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. She finished third in the 100 meter backstroke. == References == Category:Spanish swimmers Category:Living people Category:1981 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type S11 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B1
title: Raquel Saavedra Salvador
